title: Eysseric: 'We shouldn't have played'

content:
Hellas Verona midfielder Valentin Eysseric has claimed the forced break arrive too late and they “never should have played” the match against Sampdoria.
The Blucerchiati have later revealed that several of their players have tested positive for coronavirus a… [+1235 chars]
